tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (X (NP (DT That) (JJ glorious) (NN moment)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP$ your) (NN turn) (NN signal)) (VP (VBZ matches) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN beat)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN song)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN radio)))))))))))
